CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__r.Field_Value_Ending__c)), IF(Step_Goal__r.Field_Value_Ending__c = Field_Value_Ending__c, "Matched goal", "Deviated from goal" ), "Unknown" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describes whether stages were followed in the order prescribed by the Goal
CustomField.label: Next Step vs Goal Next Step
